reviewDetails.comment: From the beginning, he seemed disinterested in my care or condition. While he did order the necessary tests, he barely explained the results or offered treatment advice. Would not recommend unfortunately

I would certainly recommend Dr. Soumekh -- he is a thoughtful, and caring doctor who answers my questions, and he has a good sense of humor.  The staff who works with him are also all pleasant and work hard to make procedures go smoothly and well.  I would warn, however, that Weil Cornell has a way of doing things which seems geared more for the convenience of the administrators and much less so for the convenience of the patients.
Dr Soumekh was informative and patient while listening to my concerns
Very responsive and is always available to respond to questions
Dr. Soumekh is a great listener who cares about his patients.
Super friendly, informative and easy to work with!
Great visit. Very attentive and informative

reviewDetails.comment: She’s great! She’s knowledgeable, kind and has a deep concern for me as her patient
Dr. Lamarre has impeccable bedside manners, she’s warm, friendly and thorough.  i felt completely comfortable with her.

I’ve been seeing Dr. Lamarre for a few years now and I’ve loved my experience with her as my doctor. She is kind, considerate, knowledgeable, and creates an inviting environment to talk about my own health goals. I cannot recommend her enough!
Love Dr. Lamarre! She truly listens to my needs and thinks through the best care plan for me. I never feel rushed, and I feel like she genuinely cares about my well-being.

Dr. Lamarre was attentive, personable, thorough and kind. She performed the necessary diagnostic testing, confirmed the Flu, Type A, and immediately prescribed what I needed, with sound advice, and it most definitely sped up my recovery. I was feeling absolutely awful when I arrived, and she was very thoughtful and kind in her bedside manner and clearly very competent. 5 stars for Dr. Lamarre!

Dr lamarre is very professional and she is very patient when I explained my health issue to her. I feel that she sincerely care about my well being. I love the fact that she follow up with me to make sure all is well.
